name: Honk 3D
description:
Honk 3D, the exciting followup to the first Honk.

Possibly very necessary. Made in ~4 weeks for the annual AwfulJams.com gamejam.

I intend to keep a server hosted for as long as makes sense to at honk.goose.zone:27015, please comment if you're having issues so I can help solve them.

If you are getting disconnected make sure you're on the latest version: 1.0.1

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • E - use / eat / attack
  • ESC - menu

Notes - Version 1.0.1

  • Added a version checker.
  • Ordered an option for hosts to change spawn rates of things once the server starts. Check the Settings pane.
  • 1.0.1+ servers will disconnect client versions it doesn't recognize or that don't match the server.

Notes - Version 1.0.0

The networking can end up in a weird state from the main menu sometimes, if things seem weird or fishy, chances are you should reboot the game.
